fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Electrocute: Deal a Basic attack to a player. If they are Damp, this attack is Powerful instead and will Rampage on any other Damp players visiting your target.
-Stormy Skies: Target a player. They will become Damp until the end of the next night. **Locked**: You may now use this ability during the day.
-Darkest Night (**Locked**, 1-shot): Target up to four players Astrally. They will not receive any night feedback tonight and become Damp until the end of the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Electrocuted by Indra**
-Players who visit you will become Damp.
-Players are not informed that they are Damp.
-**Locked**: You know all players who are Damp at any given time.
-**Unlock Condition**: If you are visited twice in one night, Unlock.
